subject: Business
title: Mentorship: Growing the Next Generation
description: A short lesson to help you apply Mentorship: Growing the Next Generation.

hook.text: Bill Campbell mentored Steve Jobs, Eric Schmidt, and Jeff Bezos. He never ran a tech company himself.

buildup.text: Mentorship transfers wisdom that can't be learned from books: judgment, perspective, and emotional intelligence.

discovery.text: Great mentors don't give answers. They ask questions that help the mentee find their own.

twist.text: Mentoring benefits the mentor too. Teaching forces reflection. Helping others grow deepens your own understanding.

climax.text: Companies with formal mentoring programs have 72% higher retention rates, per a Sun Microsystems study.

punchline.text: A leader's greatest legacy is the leaders they create.

quiz.question: What is the primary benefit of great mentorship?
options: It transfers judgment and perspective that can't be learned from books
It gives mentees step-by-step instructions for success
It guarantees promotions for the mentee
